mapper.sql: id, uid, start_date, end_date, enterprise_id, department_id, place_id, add_date, p_uid, del_date, work_adr, work_name, activity_id
mapper.insert: insert into work_info (id, uid, start_date, end_date, enterprise_id, department_id, place_id, add_date, p_uid, del_date, work_adr, work_name, activity_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{placeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{workAdr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update work_info
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

work_name = #{workName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update work_info set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, place_id = #{placeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_date = #{addDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, p_uid = #{pUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_date = #{delDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, work_adr = #{workAdr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_name = #{workName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, uid, STR_TO_DATE(start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') start_date, STR_TO_DATE(end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') end_date, enterprise_id, department_id, place_id, add_date, p_uid, del_date, work_adr, work_name, activity_id from work_info where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
